The Sheltering Storm is an organization within House [[Lyrandar]] which works to protect the vessels of the [[Windwrights Guild]] from piracy and other threats. The group includes [[dragonmark]]ed Lyrandar heirs who can wield their [[Mark of Storm]] as a weapon, blasting their enemies with terrible winds and charging their sabers with crackling lightning (as the spell [[elemental weapon]]). Woe to the [[Lhazaar|Lhazaar Principalities]] pirate who tries his luck against an [[elemental vessel]] only to find a Storm sentry on board.

Agents in the Sheltering Storm often have semi-permanent positions on specific ships, with important cargo assigned according to the sentry guarding it. The Sheltering Storm maintains a small training facility on the island of [[Stormhome]], but sentries more often use general house [[enclave]]s and [[Windwrights Guild]] facilities.
title: Sheltering Storm
